result.arabic_text: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡۚ لَا ظُلۡمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
result.translation: 17. Asaaku (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) ummaan nafsi addunyal umaanée kee maqaanck abba heemil galtima, asaaku dulmi mayan diggah Yalli cisaabat (fokkooqot) sissikih.
